pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Linux Test Project is a joint project started by SGI and maintained by IBM, that has a goal to deliver test suites to the open source community that validate the reliability, robustness, and stability of Linux. The LTP testsuite contains a collection of tools for testing the Linux kernel and related features.
